meanings.definition: The state or quality of being oozinesses.
meanings.sent1: The oozinesses of the mud made it difficult to walk through.
meanings.sent2: I could feel the oozinesses of the slime between my fingers.
meanings.sent3: The oozinesses of the jelly made it slip out of my hands.
meanings.sent4: The oozinesses of the swamp engulfed everything in its path.
meanings.sent5: The oozinesses of the wet paint left a trail on the floor.

meanings.definition: The act or process of oozinesses.
meanings.sent1: The slow oozinesses of the lava down the volcano was mesmerizing.
meanings.sent2: The oozinesses of the honey dripping from the spoon was satisfying.
meanings.sent3: The oozinesses of the glue drying on the paper was oddly satisfying.
meanings.sent4: The oozinesses of the waterfall cascading down the rocks was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The oozinesses of the syrup pouring over the pancakes was delicious.

meanings.definition: A feeling or sensation of oozinesses.
meanings.sent1: The oozinesses of fear crept up my spine as I entered the dark room.
meanings.sent2: The oozinesses of excitement bubbled in my chest as I opened the gift.
meanings.sent3: The oozinesses of anticipation filled the air before the surprise party.
meanings.sent4: The oozinesses of nostalgia washed over me as I looked at old photos.
meanings.sent5: The oozinesses of joy spread through the room during the celebration.
